review: The fire stick was easy to plug in. We do need to increase the speed of our internet router as movies are delayed for downloading.
author: Roberta A. Manis

review: I feel that this might be great if directions on use would have come with it. I have a cable channel selector and the one that came with the stick doesn't work with the other one. I can't get anything to come up when I hit options. I see that Netflex is there and a few other ones but it is not letting me access them. Not really happy with the stick. I am not mechanically gifted so I wish there were more instructions with it.
author: boston

review: What a great product this is, easy as pie to install and operate. One of the best tools for computer I ever bought.
author: Edward Brady

review: I ordered the fire tv stick friday, received it Monday, on a holiday! Great service. Once I opened it. 5 to 6 minutes later my son was watching Netflix. This thing is better and easier to use than I thought it would be.

review: Works even farther away from my wi-fi than I had hoped! I was wonderfully surprised! Great product! Very happy with it! Planning on getting the game controller soon since you can play so many games on it too!

review: Arrived and had connected and watching Bosch in ten minutes. Would have been sooner but my WiFi required a password.  I entered incorrect ly first time. This is awesome device. Much easier than using my smart TV setup.  I recommend to anyone with HD TV and HDMI connections.
